item.title: Complete Transparency
item.author: Kyle Walters
item.description: Target Audience This blog article is intended for anyone who would like to understand exactly which technologies and infrastructure this blog leverages. This blog post would be useful for someone who would like to start a similar blog or any privacy-conscience folks that would like to know exactly what visibilty third-parties have into your visits to this website. Technology and Infrastructure This website leverages Hugo blog CMS software which generates a static website.

item.title: About Me
item.author: Kyle Walters
item.description: Introduction Hi, my name is Kyle Walters and I currently work in Cloud Operations. I am working to make the transition into being a Devops engineer. I created this blog to document the time and effrot I allocate towards improving my skills to be desirable to future employers for Devops-related roles. Hobbies & Interests Linux Security Competitions (CTFs) Coffee Cloud Career Currently, my goal is to make a transition into a Devops role.
